```{r, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
dotIcon <- makeIcon(
    iconUrl = "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6a/Heart_left-highlight_jon_01.svg/1920px-Heart_left-highlight_jon_01.svg.png",
    iconWidth = 31*215/230, iconHeight = 31,
    iconAnchorX = 31*215/230/2, iconAnchorY = 16
)
heartLatLong <- data.frame(
    lat = c(40.739716, 40.765683, 40.723964, 40.675868, 40.601200, 40.669204, 40.704035, 40.762356),
    lng = c(-73.914447, -73.835049, -73.773603, -73.811195, -73.890839, -73.982084, -74.058988, -74.008566))

heartLatLong %>% 
    leaflet() %>%
    addTiles() %>% 
    addMarkers(icon = dotIcon)
```
